definition: lit. the ugly daughter-in-law must sooner or later meet her parents-in-law (idiom)/fig. it's not something you can avoid forever
pinyin: chou3 xi2 fu4 zao3 wan3 ye3 dei3 jian4 gong1 po2
containing_words.word: 醜媳婦早晚也得見公婆

sentences.english: Time of detection greatly effects melanoma's cure rate.
sentences.chinese: 黑素瘤確診的時間早晚極大地影響着治癒的概率。

sentences.english: The level of calcification was positive correlation with time of clinical symptom.
sentences.chinese: 鈣化的輕重與臨牀表現出現的早晚成正相關。

sentences.english: Calmly all, because you know the answer sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 平常心對待一切，因爲你早晚會知道答案。

sentences.english: Small things like these can make all the difference, and will allow you to reach your goals sooner then later.
sentences.chinese: 小事情成就大不同，早晚有一天你能實現你的夢想。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, it might all come crashing down. But Kevin did not really care.
sentences.chinese: 早早晚晚，這種生活會土崩瓦解，可凱文並布在乎。

sentences.english: And the Philistine drew near morning and evening, and presented himself forty days.
sentences.chinese: 那非利士人早晚都出來站着，如此四十日。

sentences.english: Every morning and evening she practiced her Buddhist devotions, and she never missed a day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天早晚禮佛，從沒有一天延誤。

sentences.english: It was already the beginning of Spring, and Xingyi's weather was still damp and gloomily cold.
sentences.chinese: 時已立春，興義早晚的天氣仍然陰冷潮溼。

sentences.english: "I'm afraid the street will be knocked down sooner or later, " Ji said.
sentences.chinese: “我擔心這個街區早晚要被拆，”嵇汝廣說。

sentences.english: Northern Rock was an accident waiting to happen.
sentences.chinese: 北巖早晚都會出現問題。

sentences.english: In time, these players, too, will morph into computers.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的音樂播放器早晚也會變成電腦。

sentences.english: Every morning and evening, the parents would go out to find food for their little ones.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晚，它們會出去找食物回來給它們小孩喫。

sentences.english: The very real temptation in any group of people is sooner or later I to tear themselves apart.
sentences.chinese: 任何一個羣體，早晚都會出現分裂的危機。

sentences.english: Yeah? Well day and night, night and day just keep callin' em.
sentences.chinese: 是麼？好的，繼續一直給他們打電話，不管早晚。

sentences.english: Mr Black renounces the world, the flesh, and the devil, preaches and prays day and night.
sentences.chinese: 布萊克先生放棄了紅塵，早晚傳教禱告。

sentences.english: The overprinted part of the early and late stages is the ore shoot part in the ore area.
sentences.chinese: 早晚兩期成礦疊加部位構成礦區內富礦段。

definition: as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
to be bound to/to be sure to
